title: Can I use Huawei battery chargers abroad
answer:
Huawei battery chargers require a particular input voltage. Refer to the information on the charger label for details. If the voltage of the country or region in question meets the requirements, you can normally use the charger without a voltage converter. 

 Mains sockets abroad may be different from those in your own country, in which case you will need a plug adapter to use your charger.
keywords: charger, going abroad, overseas, normal, use
